Package com.genband.kandy.api.services.calls

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IKandyCall
    This interface is used to initiate a voice or video call.
    IKandyCallService
    This interface is used to access to the internal call service implementation.
    IKandyIncomingCall
    This interface is used to handle incoming calls.
    IKandyOutgoingCall
    This interface is used to handle outgoing calls.
    KandyCallResponseListener
    This method receives the status of the call request.
    KandyCallRTPStatisticsListener
    Listen to the KandyRTPStatistics' updates
    KandyCallServiceNotificationListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked for call operations.
    KandyGSMCallServiceNotificationListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GSMCallPhoneStateListener
    Listener which listen to phone state changes ( PhoneStateListener.LISTEN_CALL_STATE) and used for handling of the GSM call callbacks KandyGSMCallServiceNotificationListener.onGSMCallIncoming(IKandyCall, String) , KandyGSMCallServiceNotificationListener.onGSMCallConnected(IKandyCall, String) and KandyGSMCallServiceNotificationListener.onGSMCallDisconnected(IKandyCall, String)

    Logic: TelephonyManager.CALL_STATE_RINGING -> onGSMCallIncoming isRinging := true TelephonyManager.CALL_STATE_OFFHOOK -> if(isRingning) then onGSMCallConnected and isCallInProcess := true TelephonyManager.CALL_STATE_IDLE -> No Active Calls if(isRinging) then incoming call rejected if(isCallInProcess) then onGSMCallDisconnected isCallInProcess := false
    KandyCallSettings  
    KandyCallTerminationReason  
    KandyRecord  
    KandyView
    The object in which the video will be displayed.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KandyCallState  
    KandyOutgingVoipCallOptions  
    KandyOutgoingPSTNCallOptions  
    KandyRecordType  
    KandyVideoCallImageOrientation
